cause.description:
The clouded leopard is one of the most beautiful members of the feline family. This medium-sized cat is being slaughtered for its fur and by development/slash and burn agriculture throughout its home range. These cats are extremely difficult to breed in captivity, so its hard to even establish a captive population.
1. Poaching of Clouded Leopards MUST stop
2. The Clouded Leopard's land must be protected
3. More money should go towards a successful breeding program
cause.mission: Help stabilize the world's population of Clouded Leopards
cause.name: Save the Clouded Leopard
